name: BuildAMap
description:
Build A Map - Create a World

BuildAMap is a classic platformer game with a little twist. Simple or complex maps? It's up to you This is your World, you make the rules. Exciting gameplay on maps built by yourself, made by others, or included in game. Multiple difficulty levels - push the game to the limit! Build your own map today... The possibilities can only be limited by your imagination!

by Nerd-Studios TM
